actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

special_abilities.name: Disarming Attach (1/Turn)
special_abilities.desc: When the herbalist hits a creature with an attack from its shortsword or shortbow, it can choose to force the target to succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or take an additional 3 (1d6) piercing damage from the attack and drop an object it is holding of the herbalist's choice. The object lands at its feet.

special_abilities.name: Poultice (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: The herbalist spends 1 minute to apply a poultice to a wounded creature. That creature regains 14 (4d6) hit points. Alternatively, it can use this ability to cure the creature of one poison afflicting it.
